General.Name: Zhejiang Wanma Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Wanma Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of communication cables in China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Wire and Cable, New Material, and New Energy. It offers power, XLPE insulated, medium and low voltage, fire-resistant, civil building, and other cables. The company also provides coaxial cables, indoor and outdoor optical cables, security data cables, component cables, etc. Its cables are used in industrial robots, lithium battery manufacturing, industrial automation equipment, medical equipment, home appliances, and other industries. Zhejiang Wanma Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
